attributes.additional_details: Jacob Rees Mogg can be seen in action all over youtube, he has appeared on TV many many times in programs like bbc questiontime and never lost an argument, his points are always well made, logical and sensible.
attributes.background: Theresa May voted remain at the EU referendum and has not shown any real enthusiasm in getting us out as PM. Jacob Rees Mogg on the other hand is not only committed to brexit in a way which is best for the people of the UK he also makes perfect sense on all issues in government. A perfect PM.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
